# Copilot Instructions â€“ React Native (Expo) Project

## Tech Stack

- React Native with Expo (latest)
- TypeScript
- Zustand for state management
- NativeWind for styling
- Gluestack UI for components
- React Hook Form for forms
- TanStack React Query for data fetching
- Axios for API
- Expo Router (if applicable)

---

## General Rules

- Always use **TypeScript**
- Prefer **functional components**
- Use **hooks** instead of classes
- Follow **Expo best practices**
- Code must be:
  - Readable
  - Maintainable
  - Scalable
  - Mobile-optimized

---

## Project Structure

Use feature-based structure:

src/
app/
(auth)/
(tabs)/
...
components/
store/
auth.store.ts
hooks/
services/
utils/
types/
assets/
constants/
lib/
